restlib

Class ClientPreferencesBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • restlib.ClientPreferencesBuilder

  • @NotThreadSafe
public final class ClientPreferencesBuilder
extends Object
    A builder for generating instances of ClientPreference. ClientPreferencesBuilder instances can be reused; it is safe to call build() multiple times to build multiple ClientPreference instances.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClientPreferencesBuilder addAcceptedCharset(Preference<Charset> charset)
      Adds the Charset preference to this builder's accepted Charset preference set.
      ClientPreferencesBuilder addAcceptedCharsets(Iterable<Preference<Charset>> charsets)
      Adds each Charset preference to this builder's accepted Charset preference set.
      ClientPreferencesBuilder addAcceptedEncoding(Preference<ContentEncoding> encoding)
      Adds the ContentEnncoding preference to this builder's accepted ContentEncodings preference set.
      ClientPreferencesBuilder addAcceptedEncodings(Iterable<Preference<ContentEncoding>> encodings)
      Adds each encoding preference to this builder's accepted ContentEncodings preference set.
      ClientPreferencesBuilder addAcceptedLanguage(Preference<Language> language)
      Adds the Language preference to this builder's accepted Language preference set.
      ClientPreferencesBuilder addAcceptedLanguages(Iterable<Preference<Language>> languages)
      Adds each Language preference to this builder's accepted Language preference set.
      ClientPreferencesBuilder addAcceptedMediaRange(Preference<MediaRange> mediaRange)
      Adds the MediaRange preference to this builder's accepted MediaRange preference set.
      ClientPreferencesBuilder addAcceptedMediaRanges(Iterable<Preference<MediaRange>> mediaRanges)
      Adds each MediaRange preference to this builder's accepted MediaRange preference set.
      ClientPreferencesBuilder addAcceptedTransferEncoding(Preference<TransferCoding> transferEncoding)
      Adds the TransferEncoding preference to this builder's accepted TransferEncoding preference set.
      ClientPreferencesBuilder addAcceptedTransferEncodings(Iterable<Preference<TransferCoding>> transferEncodings)
      Adds each TransferEncoding preference to this builder's accepted TransferEncoding preference set.
      ClientPreferences build()
      Returns a newly-created ClientPreferences instance based on the contents of the ClientPreferencesBuilder.
      ClientPreferencesBuilder setRange(Range range)
      Sets this builder's Range preference.
